00576     class Validator: public QIntValidator{
00577             
00578     public:
00579       inline Validator(QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):QIntValidator(parent,name){
00580         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);        
00581       };
00582       inline Validator(int minimum,int maximum,QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):
00583       QIntValidator(minimum,maximum,parent,name){
00584         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);
00585       };
00586       inline ~Validator(){};
00587       inline void fixup (QString& input) const{
00588         input = QString("%1").arg(klusters->timeWindow);
00589       };
00590     private:
00591       KlustersApp* klusters;
00592     };

00644     class BinSizeValidator;
00645     friend class BinSizeValidator;
00646 
00652     class BinSizeValidator: public QIntValidator{
00653 
00654     public:
00655       inline BinSizeValidator(QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):QIntValidator(parent,name){
00656         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);
00657       };
00658       inline BinSizeValidator(int minimum,int maximum,QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):
00659       QIntValidator(minimum,maximum,parent,name){
00660         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);
00661       };
00662       inline ~BinSizeValidator(){};                  
00663       inline void fixup (QString& input) const{
00664        //If the state determine in validate was invalid, fix by setting back the last correct value.
00665         input = QString("%1").arg(klusters->binSize);      
00666       };
00667       inline QValidator::State validate(QString &input,int& pos) const{             
00668         QValidator::State state = QIntValidator::validate(input,pos);
00669         //Let the QIntValidator validates the value as to know if it is a correct integer (within the range).
00670         if(state != QValidator::Acceptable) return state;
00671         //If the value is a correct integer, update the correlogramsHalfDuration if need it.
00672         // correlogramTimeFrame (2 * correlogramsHalfDuration) has to be (2k + 1) * binSize.
00673         else{
00674          int sizeOfBin = input.toInt();         
00675          int halfTimeFrame = (klusters->correlogramsHalfDuration->displayText()).toInt();
00676                   
00677          float x = (2*static_cast<float>(halfTimeFrame)/static_cast<float>(sizeOfBin)-1)*0.5;
00678          int k = static_cast<int>(x + 0.5);
00679          
00680          klusters->correlogramTimeFrame = (2*k+1) * sizeOfBin;        
00681          if(k != x){
00682          // klusters->correlogramsHalfDuration->setText(QString("%1").arg(k * sizeOfBin));
00683           klusters->correlogramsHalfDuration->setText(QString("%1").arg(static_cast<int>(klusters->correlogramTimeFrame / 2)));
00684          }
00685          return state;
00686         }
00687       };
00688     private:
00689       KlustersApp* klusters;
00690     };
00691 
00695     BinSizeValidator binSizeValidator;

00697     class CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator;
00698     friend class CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator;
00699 
00705     class CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator: public QIntValidator{
00706 
00707     public:
00708       inline CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator(QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):QIntValidator(parent,name){
00709         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);
00710       };
00711       inline CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator(int minimum,int maximum,QObject* parent, const char* name = 0):
00712       QIntValidator(minimum,maximum,parent,name){
00713         klusters = dynamic_cast<KlustersApp*>(parent);
00714       };
00715       inline ~CorrelogramsHalfTimeFrameValidator(){};
00716       inline void fixup (QString& input) const{
00717        int halfTimeFrame = input.toInt();
00718 
00719        //The value entered was not an integer
00720        if(halfTimeFrame == 0){
00721         input = QString("%1").arg((klusters->correlogramTimeFrame - klusters->binSize) / 2);
00722         return;
00723        }
00724       };
00725       
00726     private:
00727       KlustersApp* klusters;
00728     };

00786  class printDialogPage : public KPrintDialogPage{
00787   public:
00788    inline printDialogPage(QWidget* parent = 0,const char* name = 0): KPrintDialogPage(parent,name){
00789     setTitle(i18n("Background Color"));
00790     backgroundColor = new QCheckBox("Use white background",this);
00791     backgroundColor->adjustSize();
00792    };
00793 
00794     inline void getOptions(QMap<QString,QString>& opts,bool incldef){
00795       opts["kde-klusters-backgroundColor"] = (backgroundColor->isChecked() ? "1" : "-1");
00796     };
00797 
00798     inline void setOptions(const QMap<QString,QString>& opts){
00799      backgroundColor->setChecked(opts["kde-klusters-backgroundColor"] == "1");
00800     };
00801 
00802     inline bool isValid(QString& message){return true;};
00803 
00804   private:
00805     QCheckBox* backgroundColor;
00806   };
